author: cbennett@dailydot.com (Colette Bennett)
title: The Steam Link and controller are now cheaper than ever
text:
Photo via Steam (CC-BY-SA) Get everything you need to play your Steam library on your TV for about $55. 
If you decided to wait on the Steam Link and controller when it first came out, you may be interested to know that the price has significantly dropped , making it cheaper than ever before. 
Amazon has marked the price of the Link down to $19.99 from it's original $49.99 and the controller to $34.99 from $49.99, making it roughly $55 to bring your entire Steam game collection to your living room television. While many Steam gamers prefer to play with a keyboard, the appeal of the Link is pretty clear. Combine this deal with Steam's never ending stream of sales, and you may have enough media to last you well into old age.
